title: Bug 120216: Group dialog should be shown even when dataset is not set
OB: An error is shown when trying to access the group dialog when the dataset is not set.
EB: The group dialog should be shown regardless of whether the dataset is set or not.
SR:
1. Launch the application.
2. Navigate to the group section.
3. Click on the 'Create group' button or any other action that opens the group dialog.
4. Verify that the group dialog is displayed even if the dataset is not set.
